description: an adversary may trick an authenticated or trusted victim into transmitting unauthorized actions on their behalf

1: adversary crafts an exploit url for a fund transfer from a vulnerable website
bob logs in to the vulnerable website (bob is authenticated - session cookie is saved)
adversary tricks bob into clicking on the exploit url
bob clicks on the exploit url
bob's browser loads the session cookie and performs fund transfer
2: adversary crafts an exploit for a fund transfer from a vulnerable website
adversary uploads the exploit to a malicious website
bob logs in to the vulnerable website (bob is authenticated - session cookie is saved)
adversary tricks bob into clicking on the malicious website
bob clicks on the malicious website
bob's browser loads the session cookie and performs fund transfer
